47 template <typename Derived>
48 class ContEngine : public BinaryEngine<Derived> {
49  public:
50  // Class hierarchy typedefs
51  typedef ContEngine<Derived> ContEngine_;
52  typedef BinaryEngine<Derived> BinaryEngine_;
53  typedef ExprEngine<Derived>
54  ExprEngine_;
55 
56  // Argument typedefs
57  typedef typename EngineTrait<Derived>::left_type
58  left_type;
59  typedef typename EngineTrait<Derived>::right_type
60  right_type;
61 
62  // Operational typedefs
63  typedef typename EngineTrait<Derived>::value_type
64  value_type;
65  typedef typename EngineTrait<Derived>::scalar_type
66  scalar_type;
67  typedef TiledArray::detail::ContractReduce<
68  value_type, typename eval_trait<typename left_type::value_type>::type,
69  typename eval_trait<typename right_type::value_type>::type,
70  scalar_type>
71  op_type;
72  typedef
73  typename EngineTrait<Derived>::policy policy;
74  typedef typename EngineTrait<Derived>::dist_eval_type
75  dist_eval_type;
76 
77  // Meta data typedefs
78  typedef typename EngineTrait<Derived>::size_type size_type;
79  typedef typename EngineTrait<Derived>::trange_type
80  trange_type;
81  typedef typename EngineTrait<Derived>::shape_type shape_type;
82  typedef typename EngineTrait<Derived>::pmap_interface
83  pmap_interface;
84 
85  protected:
86  // Import base class variables to this scope
87  using BinaryEngine_::left_;
88  using BinaryEngine_::right_;
89  using ExprEngine_::perm_;
90  using ExprEngine_::permute_tiles_;
91  using ExprEngine_::pmap_;
92  using ExprEngine_::shape_;
93  using ExprEngine_::trange_;
94  using ExprEngine_::vars_;
95  using ExprEngine_::world_;
96 
97  private:
98  typedef enum {
99  no_trans = 1,
100  trans = 2,
101  permute_to_no_trans = 3,
102  } TensorOp;
103 
104  protected:
105  scalar_type factor_;
106 
107  private:
108  VariableList left_vars_;
109  VariableList right_vars_;
110  TensorOp left_op_;
111  TensorOp right_op_;
112  op_type op_;
113  TiledArray::detail::ProcGrid
114  proc_grid_;
115  size_type K_;
116 
117  static unsigned int find(const VariableList& vars, std::string var,
118  unsigned int i, const unsigned int n) {
119  for (; i < n; ++i) {
120  if (vars[i] == var) break;
121  }
122 
123  return i;
124  }
125 
126  public:
128 
132  template <typename L, typename R>
133  ContEngine(const MultExpr<L, R>& expr)
134  : BinaryEngine_(expr),
135  factor_(1),
136  left_vars_(),
137  right_vars_(),
138  left_op_(permute_to_no_trans),
139  right_op_(permute_to_no_trans),
140  op_(),
141  proc_grid_(),
142  K_(1u) {}
143 
145 
150  template <typename L, typename R, typename S>
151  ContEngine(const ScalMultExpr<L, R, S>& expr)
152  : BinaryEngine_(expr),
153  factor_(expr.factor()),
154  left_vars_(),
155  right_vars_(),
156  left_op_(permute_to_no_trans),
157  right_op_(permute_to_no_trans),
158  op_(),
159  proc_grid_(),
160  K_(1u) {}
161 
162  // Pull base class functions into this class.
163  using ExprEngine_::derived;
164  using ExprEngine_::vars;
165 
167 
173  void perm_vars(const VariableList& target_vars) {
174  // Only permute if the arguments can be permuted
175  if ((left_op_ == permute_to_no_trans) ||
176  (right_op_ == permute_to_no_trans)) {
177  // Compute ranks
178  const unsigned int result_rank = target_vars.dim();
179  const unsigned int inner_rank =
180  (left_.vars().dim() + right_.vars().dim() - result_rank) >> 1;
181  const unsigned int left_outer_rank = left_.vars().dim() - inner_rank;
182 
183  // Check that the left- and right-hand outer variables are correctly
184  // partitioned in the target variable list.
185  bool target_partitioned = true;
186  for (unsigned int i = 0u; i < left_outer_rank; ++i)
187  target_partitioned =
188  target_partitioned && (find(target_vars, left_vars_[i], 0u,
189  left_outer_rank) < left_outer_rank);
190 
191  // If target is properly partitioned, then arguments can be permuted
192  // to fit the target.
193  if (target_partitioned) {
194  if (left_op_ == permute_to_no_trans) {
195  // Copy left-hand target variables to left and result variable lists.
196  for (unsigned int i = 0u; i < left_outer_rank; ++i) {
197  const std::string& var = target_vars[i];
198  const_cast<std::string&>(left_vars_[i]) = var;
199  const_cast<std::string&>(vars_[i]) = var;
200  }
201 
202  // Permute the left argument with the new variable list.
203  left_.perm_vars(left_vars_);
204  } else {
205  // Copy left-hand outer variables to that of result.
206  for (unsigned int i = 0u; i < left_outer_rank; ++i)
207  const_cast<std::string&>(vars_[i]) = left_vars_[i];
208  }
209 
210  if (right_op_ == permute_to_no_trans) {
211  // Copy right-hand target variables to right and result variable
212  // lists.
213  for (unsigned int i = left_outer_rank, j = inner_rank;
214  i < result_rank; ++i, ++j) {
215  const std::string& var = target_vars[i];
216  const_cast<std::string&>(right_vars_[j]) = var;
217  const_cast<std::string&>(vars_[i]) = var;
218  }
219 
220  // Permute the left argument with the new variable list.
221  right_.perm_vars(right_vars_);
222  } else {
223  // Copy right-hand outer variables to that of result.
224  for (unsigned int i = left_outer_rank, j = inner_rank;
225  i < result_rank; ++i, ++j)
226  const_cast<std::string&>(vars_[i]) = right_vars_[j];
227  }
228  }
229  }
230  }
231 
233 
237  void init_vars() {
238  const unsigned int left_rank = left_.vars().dim();
239  const unsigned int right_rank = right_.vars().dim();
240 
241  // Get non-const references to the argument variable lists.
242  std::vector<std::string>& left_vars =
243  const_cast<std::vector<std::string>&>(left_vars_.data());
244  left_vars.reserve(left_rank);
245  std::vector<std::string>& right_vars =
246  const_cast<std::vector<std::string>&>(right_vars_.data());
247  right_vars.reserve(right_rank);
248  std::vector<std::string>& result_vars =
249  const_cast<std::vector<std::string>&>(vars_.data());
250  result_vars.reserve(std::max(left_rank, right_rank));
251 
252  // Extract left-most result and inner variables from the left-hand argument.
253  for (unsigned int i = 0ul; i < left_rank; ++i) {
254  const std::string& var = left_.vars()[i];
255  if (find(right_.vars(), var, 0u, right_rank) == right_rank) {
256  // Store outer left variable
257  left_vars.push_back(var);
258  result_vars.push_back(var);
259  } else {
260  // Store inner left variable
261  right_vars.push_back(var);
262  }
263  }
264 
265  // Compute the inner and outer dimension ranks.
266  const unsigned int inner_rank = right_vars.size();
267  const unsigned int left_outer_rank = left_vars.size();
268  const unsigned int right_outer_rank = right_rank - inner_rank;
269  const unsigned int result_rank = left_outer_rank + right_outer_rank;
270 
271  // Resize result variables if necessary.
272  result_vars.reserve(result_rank);
273 
274  // Check for an outer product
275  if (inner_rank == 0u) {
276  // Extract the right most outer variables from right hand argument.
277  for (unsigned int i = 0ul; i < right_rank; ++i) {
278  const std::string& var = right_.vars()[i];
279  right_vars.push_back(var);
280  result_vars.push_back(var);
281  }
282  return; // Quick exit
283  }
284 
285  // Initialize flags that will be used to determine the type of permutation
286  // that will be applied to the arguments (i.e. no permutation, transpose,
287  // or arbitrary permutation).
288  bool inner_vars_ordered = true, left_is_no_trans = true,
289  left_is_trans = true, right_is_no_trans = true, right_is_trans = true;
290 
291  // If the inner variable lists of the arguments are not in the same
292  // order, one of them will need to be permuted. Here, we determine which
293  // argument, left or right, will be permuted if a permutation is
294  // required. The argument with the lowest rank is preferred since it is
295  // likely to have the smaller memory footprint, or the fewest leaves to
296  // minimize the number of permutations in the expression.
297  const bool perm_left =
298  (left_rank < right_rank) || ((left_rank == right_rank) &&
299  (left_type::leaves <= right_type::leaves));
300 
301  // Extract variables from the right-hand argument, collect information
302  // about the layout of the variable lists, and ensure the inner variable
303  // lists are in the same order.
304  for (unsigned int i = 0ul; i < right_rank; ++i) {
305  const std::string& var = right_.vars()[i];
306  const unsigned int j = find(left_.vars(), var, 0u, left_rank);
307  if (j == left_rank) {
308  // Store outer right variable
309  right_vars.push_back(var);
310  result_vars.push_back(var);
311  } else {
312  const unsigned int x = left_vars.size() - left_outer_rank;
313 
314  // Collect information about the relative position of variables
315  inner_vars_ordered = inner_vars_ordered && (right_vars[x] == var);
316  left_is_no_trans = left_is_no_trans && (j >= left_outer_rank);
317  left_is_trans = left_is_trans && (j < inner_rank);
318  right_is_no_trans = right_is_no_trans && (i < inner_rank);
319  right_is_trans = right_is_trans && (i >= right_outer_rank);
320 
321  // Store inner right variable
322  if (inner_vars_ordered) {
323  // Left and right inner variable list order is equal.
324  left_vars.push_back(var);
325  } else if (perm_left) {
326  // Permute left so we need to store inner variables according to
327  // the order of the right-hand argument.
328  left_vars.push_back(var);
329  right_vars[x] = var;
330  left_is_no_trans = left_is_trans = false;
331  } else {
332  // Permute right so we need to store inner variables according to
333  // the order of the left-hand argument.
334  left_vars.push_back(right_vars[x]);
335  right_is_no_trans = right_is_trans = false;
336  }
337  }
338  }
339 
340  // Here we set the type of permutation that will be applied to the
341  // argument tensors. If an argument is in matrix form, permutation of
342  // the tiles is disabled.
343  if (left_is_no_trans) {
344  left_op_ = no_trans;
345  left_.permute_tiles(false);
346  } else if (left_is_trans) {
347  left_op_ = trans;
348  left_.permute_tiles(false);
349  } else {
350  left_.perm_vars(left_vars_);
351  }
352  if (right_is_no_trans) {
353  right_op_ = no_trans;
354  right_.permute_tiles(false);
355  } else if (right_is_trans) {
356  right_op_ = trans;
357  right_.permute_tiles(false);
358  } else {
359  right_.perm_vars(right_vars_);
360  }
361  }
362 
364 
368  void init_struct(const VariableList& target_vars) {
369  // Initialize children
370  left_.init_struct(left_vars_);
371  right_.init_struct(right_vars_);
372 
373  // Initialize the tile operation in this function because it is used to
374  // evaluate the tiled range and shape.
375 
376  const madness::cblas::CBLAS_TRANSPOSE left_op =
377  (left_op_ == trans ? madness::cblas::Trans : madness::cblas::NoTrans);
378  const madness::cblas::CBLAS_TRANSPOSE right_op =
379  (right_op_ == trans ? madness::cblas::Trans : madness::cblas::NoTrans);
380 
381  if (target_vars != vars_) {
382  // Initialize permuted structure
383  perm_ = ExprEngine_::make_perm(target_vars);
384  op_ =
385  op_type(left_op, right_op, factor_, vars_.dim(), left_vars_.dim(),
386  right_vars_.dim(), (permute_tiles_ ? perm_ : Permutation()));
387  trange_ = ContEngine_::make_trange(perm_);
388  shape_ = ContEngine_::make_shape(perm_);
389  } else {
390  // Initialize non-permuted structure
391  op_ = op_type(left_op, right_op, factor_, vars_.dim(), left_vars_.dim(),
392  right_vars_.dim());
393  trange_ = ContEngine_::make_trange();
394  shape_ = ContEngine_::make_shape();
395  }
396 
397  if (ExprEngine_::override_ptr_ && ExprEngine_::override_ptr_->shape) {
398  shape_ = shape_.mask(*ExprEngine_::override_ptr_->shape);
399  }
400  }
401 
403 
408  void init_distribution(World* world, std::shared_ptr<pmap_interface> pmap) {
409  const unsigned int inner_rank = op_.gemm_helper().num_contract_ranks();
410  const unsigned int left_rank = op_.gemm_helper().left_rank();
411  const unsigned int right_rank = op_.gemm_helper().right_rank();
412  const unsigned int left_outer_rank = left_rank - inner_rank;
413 
414  // Get pointers to the argument sizes
415  const size_type* MADNESS_RESTRICT const left_tiles_size =
416  left_.trange().tiles_range().extent_data();
417  const size_type* MADNESS_RESTRICT const left_element_size =
418  left_.trange().elements_range().extent_data();
419  const size_type* MADNESS_RESTRICT const right_tiles_size =
420  right_.trange().tiles_range().extent_data();
421  const size_type* MADNESS_RESTRICT const right_element_size =
422  right_.trange().elements_range().extent_data();
423 
424  // Compute the fused sizes of the contraction
425  size_type M = 1ul, m = 1ul, N = 1ul, n = 1ul;
426  unsigned int i = 0u;
427  for (; i < left_outer_rank; ++i) {
428  M *= left_tiles_size[i];
429  m *= left_element_size[i];
430  }
431  for (; i < left_rank; ++i) K_ *= left_tiles_size[i];
432  for (i = inner_rank; i < right_rank; ++i) {
433  N *= right_tiles_size[i];
434  n *= right_element_size[i];
435  }
436 
437  // Construct the process grid.
438  proc_grid_ = TiledArray::detail::ProcGrid(*world, M, N, m, n);
439 
440  // Initialize children
441  left_.init_distribution(world, proc_grid_.make_row_phase_pmap(K_));
442  right_.init_distribution(world, proc_grid_.make_col_phase_pmap(K_));
443 
444  // Initialize the process map in not already defined
445  if (!pmap) pmap = proc_grid_.make_pmap();
446  ExprEngine_::init_distribution(world, pmap);
447  }
448 
450 
453  trange_type make_trange(const Permutation& perm = Permutation()) const {
454  // Compute iteration limits
455  const unsigned int left_rank = op_.gemm_helper().left_rank();
456  const unsigned int right_rank = op_.gemm_helper().right_rank();
457  const unsigned int inner_rank = op_.gemm_helper().num_contract_ranks();
458  const unsigned int left_outer_rank = left_rank - inner_rank;
459 
460  // Construct the trange input and compute the gemm sizes
461  typename trange_type::Ranges ranges(op_.gemm_helper().result_rank());
462  unsigned int i = 0ul;
463  for (unsigned int x = 0ul; x < left_outer_rank; ++x, ++i) {
464  const unsigned int pi = (perm ? perm[i] : i);
465  ranges[pi] = left_.trange().data()[x];
466  }
467  for (unsigned int x = inner_rank; x < right_rank; ++x, ++i) {
468  const unsigned int pi = (perm ? perm[i] : i);
469  ranges[pi] = right_.trange().data()[x];
470  }
471 
472 #ifndef NDEBUG
473 
474  // Check that the contracted dimensions have congruent tilings
475  for (unsigned int l = left_outer_rank, r = 0ul; l < left_rank; ++l, ++r) {
476  if (!is_congruent(left_.trange().data()[l], right_.trange().data()[r])) {
477  if (TiledArray::get_default_world().rank() == 0) {
478  TA_USER_ERROR_MESSAGE(
479  "The contracted dimensions of the left- "
480  "and right-hand arguments are not congruent:"
481  << "\n left = " << left_.trange()
482  << "\n right = " << right_.trange());
483 
484  TA_EXCEPTION(
485  "The contracted dimensions of the left- and "
486  "right-hand expressions are not congruent.");
487  }
488 
489  TA_EXCEPTION(
490  "The contracted dimensions of the left- and "
491  "right-hand expressions are not congruent.");
492  }
493  }
494 #endif // NDEBUG
495 
496  return trange_type(ranges.begin(), ranges.end());
497  }
498 
500 
502  shape_type make_shape() const {
503  const TiledArray::math::GemmHelper shape_gemm_helper(
504  madness::cblas::NoTrans, madness::cblas::NoTrans,
505  op_.gemm_helper().result_rank(), op_.gemm_helper().left_rank(),
506  op_.gemm_helper().right_rank());
507  return left_.shape().gemm(right_.shape(), factor_, shape_gemm_helper);
508  }
509 
511 
514  shape_type make_shape(const Permutation& perm) const {
515  const TiledArray::math::GemmHelper shape_gemm_helper(
516  madness::cblas::NoTrans, madness::cblas::NoTrans,
517  op_.gemm_helper().result_rank(), op_.gemm_helper().left_rank(),
518  op_.gemm_helper().right_rank());
519  return left_.shape().gemm(right_.shape(), factor_, shape_gemm_helper, perm);
520  }
521 
522  dist_eval_type make_dist_eval() const {
523  // Define the impl type
524  typedef TiledArray::detail::Summa<typename left_type::dist_eval_type,
525  typename right_type::dist_eval_type,
526  op_type, typename Derived::policy>
527  impl_type;
528 
529  typename left_type::dist_eval_type left = left_.make_dist_eval();
530  typename right_type::dist_eval_type right = right_.make_dist_eval();
531 
532  std::shared_ptr<impl_type> pimpl =
533  std::make_shared<impl_type>(left, right, *world_, trange_, shape_,
534  pmap_, perm_, op_, K_, proc_grid_);
535 
536  return dist_eval_type(pimpl);
537  }
538 
540 
542  std::string make_tag() const {
543  std::stringstream ss;
544  ss << "[*]";
545  if (factor_ != scalar_type(1)) ss << "[" << factor_ << "]";
546  return ss.str();
547  }
548 
550 
553  void print(ExprOStream os, const VariableList& target_vars) const {
554  ExprEngine_::print(os, target_vars);
555  os.inc();
556  left_.print(os, left_vars_);
557  right_.print(os, right_vars_);
558  os.dec();
559  }
560 
561 }; // class ContEngine

564 } // namespace TiledArray
